title: Kashmir Unplugged Adventure
description: Enjoy the serene beauty of snow-covered mountains in Kashmir.
details:
Choose Customised packages: Kashmir Tour Packages

Discover the beauty of Kashmir with our curated Kashmir tour packages designed to suit every kind of traveller.

Why book Kashmir trip package with us

Planning a trip to Kashmir can be daunting. At MaximTrip, we make it easy with the best deals and expert guidance.

Tailor-Made Kashmir Holiday Packages

Welcome to the paradise on Earth – Kashmir. Imagine waking up to snow-capped mountains shimmering under golden sunlight, the sound of gentle rivers flowing through lush valleys, and the fragrance of saffron fields filling the crisp mountain air. Our specially curated Kashmir tour packages are designed to take you beyond the usual tourist trails and help you experience this heavenly destination like never before.

From the charming streets of Srinagar to the mesmerizing meadows of Gulmarg and the soul-stirring beauty of Pahalgam, every moment in Kashmir feels like a dream. Ride a traditional shikara on the calm waters of Dal Lake, spend cozy nights in luxury houseboats with panoramic views, and let the warm hospitality of the locals melt your heart. Whether you are planning a romantic honeymoon, a family getaway, or an adventure-filled vacation, Kashmir has something magical for everyone.

Why Choose Our Kashmir Packages?

Unlike regular tours, our packages offer a blend of luxury, authenticity, and cultural richness. We take care of everything – from comfortable stays and scenic transfers to authentic dining experiences and guided sightseeing. Our itineraries are designed for travelers who want to explore the real essence of Kashmir rather than just ticking off destinations.

Top Experiences You Will Love:

  • Shikara Ride on Dal Lake: Glide through floating markets, lotus gardens, and quaint houseboats while listening to the soothing sound of water.
  • Gulmarg Gondola Ride: One of the highest cable cars in the world, offering panoramic views of snow-clad mountains and green meadows in summer.
  • Stay in Heritage Houseboats: Experience the old-world charm of Kashmiri wooden carvings combined with modern luxury on Dal Lake.
  • Pahalgam & Betaab Valley: Witness breathtaking landscapes where Bollywood blockbusters were filmed.
  • Savor Authentic Kashmiri Cuisine: Treat yourself to delicacies like Rogan Josh, Yakhni, and the world-famous Kahwa tea.

Best Time to Visit:

Kashmir is a year-round destination. Visit in winter (Dec–Feb) for snow and skiing in Gulmarg, or in spring and summer (Mar–Aug) to see vibrant tulip gardens, green valleys, and pleasant weather. Autumn (Sep–Nov) offers golden chinar leaves, making it a photographer’s paradise.

Why Travelers Love Kashmir:

The unmatched beauty, warm-hearted locals, rich traditions, and endless opportunities for adventure make Kashmir the ultimate travel destination. Whether you are strolling through Mughal gardens, shopping for Pashmina shawls, or sipping Kahwa by the lakeside, every experience in Kashmir becomes a lifelong memory.

Pack your bags and book your Kashmir holiday today – because heaven is not just a dream, it’s a destination!
